price: Yԑma (ᴐsa tuo) ho kwan ma wͻn a yatu wͻn so sa no, efiri sε yasisi wͻn. Nokorε sε, Nyankopͻn wͻ tumi sε Ɔboa wͻn.
arabic: أُذِنَ لِلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتَلُونَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ظُلِمُواْۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ نَصۡرِهِمۡ لَقَدِيرٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: udhina lilladhīna yuqātalūna bi-annahum ẓulimū wa-inna al-laha ʿalā naṣrihim laqadīrun
